column5: My family and i went up to koochiching to visit some of our friends.  I woke up at 6:45 and took their paddle boat out a trolled behind it.  After about an hour I had caught a couple perch.  The part of the lake we were at was really weedy so every now and then I had to bring in my lure to take the weeds off.  As my lure was 5 feet away from the boat i saw a massive small mouth take my lure.  I got it in the boat and it was 20" the biggest of the year.
Nice catch, watch the bigger boats on Cooch when you're in a small boat. There are many good spots to fish there.
Nice fish!  Where is this lake of which you speak?  Is it near Lake Couchiching Orillia?  Just messin with ya. Nice ghoti
Not a bad fish for just poking around!!very nice.
